mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER2(MEMBERNUM, EMAIL, PW, NAME, ADDRESS1, ADDRESS2, ADDRESS3, RRNF, RRNL, JOINDATE, MEMBERSTATE, ADMINCHECK, PHONENUM, OWNCHECK, SALT) VALUES(#{memberNum}, #{email}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{address3}, #{rrnf}, #{rrnl}, now(), 1, 1, #{phoneNum}, 1, #{salt})
